title: USD 2.2 Mn worth of medicines from Bangladesh
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The High Commissioner of Bangladesh handed over a medicine donation to the Sri Lanka Health Sectors worth US $ 2.2 Million on Tuesday (31) at the Ministry of Health after meeting the Minister of the Health and Water Supply Keheliya Rambukkwella.
79 different types of essential medicines were donated to Sri Lanka, and they included medication required for blood pressure and cancer.
